io.spine.server.entity.storage

Annotation Type Column


  • @Target(value=METHOD)
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Experimental
public @interface Column
    An annotation which is used to mark getters for entity columns.

    The properties of the annotation affect how the column is seen by the storage and clients.

    The annotation will have effect only if it's applied to a public instance getter, meaning a method without parameters and with get- prefix. The is- prefix is supported for primitive boolean or boxed Boolean columns.

    A Column.name() allows to specify a custom column name to be persisted in a Storage.

    If there are repeated column names within an Entity, the exception will be raised when a repository serving the entity is added to its BoundedContext.

    Please note this feature is experimental.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      java.lang.String name
      The custom name of the column.

    • Element Detail

      • name

        public abstract java.lang.String name
        The custom name of the column.

        Defaults to the name extracted from the getter which is used for querying.

        Default:
        ""
